Medicinal-Neem

Scientific Name: Azadirachta indica
Common Name: Neem
Local Name: Neem (various regional names exist)
Family: Meliaceae
Genus: Azadirachta
Location: Indian Subcontinent
Medicinal Uses: Neem has a wide range of traditional medicinal uses, including treatment for skin diseases, infections, fever, and as an anti-inflammatory and anti-parasitic agent. It is also used in dental hygiene and as a natural insecticide.
